title: A Russian anti-war politician is blocked from running against Putin
description: Russian election authorities rejected Boris Nadezhdin as a candidate in next month's presidential balloting.

title: A year after Ohio derailment, U.S. freight trains remain largely unregulated
description: ProPublica reporter Topher Sanders has spent the last two years investigating America's aging freight train system. He says the FRA monitors "less than 1% of what's happening on the rails."

title: Henry Fambrough, the last surviving original member of The Spinners, dies at 85
description: Fambrough was the last surviving original member of the iconic R&B group, whose hits included "It's a Shame," "Could It Be I'm Falling in Love" and "The Rubberband Man."

title: Supreme Court to consider whether Trump can be removed from primary ballot
description: The dispute comes from Colorado — but it could have national implications for Trump and his political fate.
